'# Set early stopping on this one'
'sweep_jo. early_termination = MedianStoppingPolicy(delay_evaluation=5,'
'evaluation_interval=2)'
'# Specify your experiment details'
'sweep_jo.display_name = "lightgm-iris-sweep-example"'
'sweep_jo. experiment_name = "lightgm-iris-sweep-example"'
'sweep_jo. description = "Run a hyperparameter sweep jo for LightGBM on'
'Iris dataset."'
'# sumit the sweep'
'returned_sweep_jo = ml_client.create_or_update(sweep_jo)'
'# get a URL for the status of the jo'
'returned_sweep_jo.services["Studio"] . endpoint'
'# Download est trial model output'
'ml_client.jos.download(returned_sweep_jo.name, output_name="model")'
'Run hyperparameter tuning in a pipeline'
'\xc2\x7 SDK v1'
'Python'
"tf_env = Environment.get(ws, name='AzureML-TensorFlow-2.0-GPU' )"
